metadata.name: Potential Persistence Via VMwareToolBoxCmd.EXE VM State Change Script
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the "VMwareToolBoxCmd.exe" with the "script" and "set" flag to setup a specific script to run for a specific VM state

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\vmwaretoolboxcmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('toolbox-cmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' script ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' set ')))

output.summary: Detects execution of the "VMwareToolBoxCmd.exe" with the "script" and "set" flag to setup a specific script to run for a specific VM state
